title: Eddie Jones tells Owen Farrell to worry about his own form and stop trying to be the perfect captain
text:
Eddie Jones has revealed that it has taken a pep talk on leadership to help Owen Farrell focus more on himself as a player than on his duties as England captain. Farrell’s form in in the tournament has been curiously hit-and-miss with attack coach, Scott Wisemantel, describing his performance against Argentina as ‘clunky.’

Jones, though, has ultimate faith in the man he terms ‘a warrior’, stating that this new-found balance in Farrell’s game will be of as much benefit to England as was Steve Smith to Australia in the Ashes when he did not have to worry about captaincy issues at all.

description: Eddie Jones has revealed that it has taken a pep talk on leadership to help Owen Farrell focus more on himself as a player than on his duties as England captain.
